title: Tirupati researcher shows AI can detect cervical cancer, suicidal tendency
desc: Tirupati researcher Lalasa Mukku demonstrates AI's potential to detect cervical cancer and prevent youth suicidal tendencies through innovative image analysis.

title: Winter Olympics 2026: Can Mikaela Shiffrin reclaim slalom gold 12 years after Sochi 2014?
desc: The women’s slalom will be the U.S. skier’s last chance to win a medal at Milano Cortina 2026, and she’s determined to “turn nervousness into intensity” on the big day.

title: Young Pastoralists Lead Sustainable Rangeland Development in IYRP 2026
desc: More than 150 young pastoralists from Uganda, Kenya, Tanzania, Ethiopia, and South Sudan recently pledged to lead rangelands and pastoralism toward a peaceful and prosperous future. title: Seven ways to spiritually prepare for 2026 Ramadan
desc: The Nation Newspaper Seven ways to spiritually prepare for 2026 Ramadan

title: New OC-PAM AI tool tracks cancer organoid drug response
desc: Explore the OC-PAM AI tool that revolutionizes cancer research with non-invasive imaging of organoids and spheroids.

title: Op Corona January seizures total millions in contraband, drugs and stolen vehicles
desc: Basotho smugglers carrying R14.5 million plus of contraband found their access to South African consumers summarily halted by South African National Defence

title: Duterte won't participate in ICC confirmation hearing via video, says Kaufman
desc: “The former President will not participate in the confirmation hearing through video-conferencing. Nor did the former President willingly appear by way of such technology at his initial appearance," Kaufman told GMA Integrated News.

title: Heat waves that push up atmospheric nanoparticle levels might explain higher death tolls

title: Sifuna Warns Sakaja Ahead of Cooperation Agreement Signing at State house
desc: This is the second time the Nairobi County Government has been transferred to the National Government, with the last time it happened being under Mike Mbuvi Sonko in 2020, during the leadership of Uhuru Kenyatta.

title: Benedetta Porcaroli to star in the Closing Ceremony of Milan Cortina 2026
desc: On February 22nd, the actress will take part in the Olympic Grand Finale at the Verona Arena.
